title: Matching bases
text: With all terms containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$4x-2=10$$.

title: Solve for x
text: $$4x-2=10$$ Solve for x get $$x=3$$ which is positive. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, b can not be negative. So $$x=3$$ is the solution for the equation.
